title: Mage Hand
content: ts turns to throw whatever item you need from its stockpile. After combat ends, just remember to pick up whatever items are left in the Mage Hand's stockpile. Note that particularly dangerous items like fireworks and bombs are likely to tempt the enemy AI to try and detonate them with ranged attacks.
